fees.description:
Charged when a direct debit payment has dishonoured or reversed. This charge is not subject to GST.
For more information on these fees and other fees, please visit energylocalsretail.com.au/fees
Charged for providing a paper bill
May be charged when you move into a property or change retailer. Actual fee may vary.
May be charged when you move out and require a final meter read. Actual fee may vary.

We accept Visa, Mastercard & AMEX payments via energylocalsretail.com.au/pay-by-card. Debit card transactions are subject to a 0.46% fee, and credit card payments incur a 0.81% fee. Card processing fees are waived for Direct Debit payments.

gasContract.terms: Energy Locals offers no lock in contracts or exit fees. Prices may vary in accordance with the terms and conditions. See energylocalsretail.com.au/terms for full terms and conditions.

discounts.description: Stay on this plan for 6 months, and we'll credit $50 to your account. Terms apply - visit energylocalsretail.com.au/terms-and-conditions for full details.

gasContract.variation: Due to changes in the market and economic conditions, we may update your tariff and/or fees. We will provide at least 5 business days' notice before the change takes place.

eligibility.information: Eligible for all Residential customers on the Network
